verses.text: I will sing evermore \w of|strong="H4905"\w* the love \w of|strong="H4905"\w* the \nd Lord\nd*, proclaiming to all generations his faithfulness.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w promise|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* build up \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* firm \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w*.

‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w made|strong="H3559"\w* \w with|strong="H8064"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* chosen \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* sworn \w to|strong="H3559"\w* David \w my|strong="H3588"\w* servant,

\w to|strong="H1732"\w* establish \w his|strong="H1732"\w* seed forever, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1732"\w* build up \w his|strong="H1732"\w* throne \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* ages.’ \qs Selah\qs*
\w Then|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* holy assembly \w in|strong="H1129"\w* heaven praised \w your|strong="H3559"\w* marvellous \w faithfulness|strong="H3559"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* skies \w may|strong="H3068"\w* compare \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* among \w the|strong="H3068"\w* gods?

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* feared \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy assembly, awful \w and|strong="H1121"\w* great above \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* round \w him|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d Lord
d* God \w of|strong="H6918"\w* hosts, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*? \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w and|strong="H3372"\w* faithfulness, 
d Lord
d*, \w surround|strong="H5439"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3644"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* raging sea: \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5439"\w* waves surge, \w it|strong="H5439"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* still \w them|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w It|strong="H7623"\w* \w was|strong="H3220"\w* you who did pierce \w and|strong="H3220"\w* crush Rahab \w in|strong="H4910"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* scatter \w your|strong="H7623"\w* foes by \w your|strong="H7623"\w* mighty arm.

Yours \w are|strong="H2491"\w* \w the|strong="H6340"\w* heavens, yours \w also|strong="H5797"\w* \w the|strong="H6340"\w* earth, \w the|strong="H6340"\w* world \w and|strong="H5797"\w* its fulness, it’s you \w who|strong="H2491"\w* did found them.

\w The|strong="H3245"\w* north \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H3245"\w* south, \w it|strong="H4393"\w*’s you have created \w them|strong="H3245"\w*; Tabor \w and|strong="H8064"\w* Hermon shout praise \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w your|strong="H8064"\w* name.

You \w have|strong="H8034"\w* \w an|strong="H6828"\w* arm \w with|strong="H7442"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* might \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hero; strong \w is|strong="H8034"\w* your \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, high uplifted your \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

Justice \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* base \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* throne, kindness \w and|strong="H3027"\w* faithfulness ever attend \w you|strong="H5973"\w*.

Happy \w the|strong="H6440"\w* people \w who|strong="H6664"\w* know \w the|strong="H6440"\w* glad shout, \w who|strong="H6664"\w* walk, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* light \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* exult \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* righteousness \w they|strong="H3068"\w* extol.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* pride. \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* favour \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* honour.
\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holy \nd Lord\nd* \w of|strong="H7161"\w* Israel keeps \w our|strong="H3588"\w* defender \w and|strong="H5797"\w* king.

\w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vision \w of|strong="H4428"\w* old \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* speak \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* way \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* loved: ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* crown \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hero \w I|strong="H3588"\w* chose \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people
‘\w I|strong="H5921"\w* found \w my|strong="H5921"\w* servant David, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* anointed \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w holy|strong="H2623"\w* oil.

\w My|strong="H1732"\w* \w hand|strong="H4672"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H4886"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w* forever, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* arm \w will|strong="H5650"\w* give \w him|strong="H4672"\w* strength.
‘No enemy \w will|strong="H3027"\w* dare \w to|strong="H3027"\w* assail \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, nor \w the|strong="H3027"\w* wicked \w to|strong="H3027"\w* oppress \w him|strong="H3027"\w*;

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* foes \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* shatter \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1121"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* strike down \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* hate \w him|strong="H1121"\w*.

‘\w My|strong="H6440"\w* loyal love \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w attend|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6862"\w* \w will|strong="H6440"\w* lift \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* honour.

\w I|strong="H7311"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w set|strong="H7311"\w* \w his|strong="H7311"\w* hand \w on|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w his|strong="H7311"\w* right hand \w on|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* rivers.

‘\w As|strong="H3225"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* call \w me|strong="H7760"\w* “\w My|strong="H7760"\w* father, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* rock \w of|strong="H3027"\w* salvation.”

\w And|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H6697"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* firstborn, highest \w of|strong="H6697"\w* kings \w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* earth.

‘\w My|strong="H5414"\w* love \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* keep \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* ever, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* stand fast.

\w His|strong="H8104"\w* line \w will|strong="H2617"\w* I make \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* throne \w as|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w* \w of|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* heavens.

‘\w If|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w children|strong="H2233"\w* forsake \w my|strong="H7760"\w* law, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* walk \w not|strong="H7760"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w ordained|strong="H7760"\w*;
\w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* profane \w my|strong="H5800"\w* statutes, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* keep \w my|strong="H5800"\w* commandments;

‘\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* punish \w their|strong="H3808"\w* sin \w with|strong="H2708"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* rod, \w their|strong="H3808"\w* iniquity \w with|strong="H2708"\w* scourges.

But \w my|strong="H6485"\w* love \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* not \w take|strong="H6485"\w* \w from|strong="H7626"\w* \w him|strong="H6485"\w*, nor \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* belie \w my|strong="H6485"\w* faithfulness.

‘\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* profane \w my|strong="H3808"\w* covenant \w by|strong="H5973"\w* changing \w the|strong="H5973"\w* word \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5973"\w* passed \w my|strong="H3808"\w* lips.
Once \w have|strong="H8193"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* solemnly sworn \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lie \w to|strong="H2490"\w* David,

‘\w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* line \w should|strong="H1732"\w* endure forever, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* throne as \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sun before me,

firm \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* moon which \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* fixed \w in|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sky.’ \qs Selah\qs*
But \w you|strong="H3559"\w* \w have|strong="H5707"\w* cast off \w in|strong="H3559"\w* contempt, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* furious with \w your|strong="H3559"\w* anointed.

\w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w have|strong="H5973"\w* spurned \w the|strong="H5674"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H5674"\w* servant, \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H5674"\w* sacred crown dashed \w to|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* ground.
You \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w broken|strong="H2490"\w* down all \w his|strong="H2490"\w* walls, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* laid \w his|strong="H2490"\w* bulwarks \w in|strong="H5650"\w* ruins.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* pass \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* despoil \w him|strong="H7760"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbours \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w now|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* given \w his|strong="H3605"\w* foes \w the|strong="H3605"\w* victory, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* enemies glad.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* turned back \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w from|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foe|strong="H6862"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H3225"\w* not \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* battle.

\w The|strong="H7725"\w* sceptre \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w took|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* hand, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* throne \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* hurl \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* ground.

\w You|strong="H7673"\w* \w have|strong="H7673"\w* shortened \w the|strong="H7673"\w* days \w of|strong="H3678"\w* \w his|strong="H4048"\w* youth, \w and|strong="H7673"\w* covered him with shame. \qs Selah\qs*

How \w long|strong="H3117"\w*, \nd Lord\nd* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* hide \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w forever|strong="H3117"\w*? How \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fires \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w to|strong="H5921"\w* burn?

Remember, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shortness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* life \w how|strong="H4100"\w* fleeting \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* people.

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* live without seeing death? \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* rescue \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H2465"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* clutch \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sheol? \qs Selah\qs*

\w Where|strong="H3027"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* kindness \w of|strong="H3027"\w* old, \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* faithfulness swore \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w David|strong="H3027"\w*?

Remember, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H2617"\+w*\nd*, how \w your|strong="H1732"\w* servants are mocked, how \w I|strong="H7650"\w* bear \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w the|strong="H1732"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H2617"\w* all nations

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w scorn|strong="H2781"\w* \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* enemies hurl, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w which|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* hurl \w at|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* footsteps \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* anointed.
\em Blest be the \+nd Lord\+nd*, for ever and ever.\em* \em Amen and Amen.\em*
